name: IRIS (DEMO Version)
description: IRIS is a story about Rara, a shy elementary school girl who always bring a penguin plushy named Ruka to help her socialize. Her life started to change after she helped a weird looking cat from a chasing dog. Tim, the owner of the said cat, invites Rara to come to his world, an offer he made after he learned that Rara is troubled by a mysterious creature that always entailing her...
